_sText:
IS_VOID by Target Practice

- This map is an ICE SKATE (is_) fight map.
- is_void is the third ice skate map released since the birth of this gametype.
- This map is the first to bring the diversity of multiple weapons incorporating knife and sniper combat.
- AFKers will be killed after 20 seconds each round.
- No known bugs.
- 5 hours build-time.

_________________________________________________

PLEASE NOTE: SET sv_airaccelerate to 300 for best results!

_________________________________________________

THE GAMETYPE

ICE SKATE (is_) is a custom gametype introduced by HellRaisedSurfer. 

This gametype involves skating across a surface and killing the opposing team.
This is done by using a combination of strafing (A and D keys) and mouse movement to gain momentum.

_________________________________________________

- Special thanks go to Icecreamlock for custom textures.
- Thanks to Karatekaefer for the skybox.
- Thanks to the MapJunkies server provided by Icecreamlock.
- Thanks to all the testers who played the exclusive release.

_________________________________________________

WWW.MAPJUNKIES.COM

_________________________________________________

INSTALLATION:

- To install the map you will need to copy&paste (or extract the contents of the .rar if you wish) the .BSP file (is_void.bsp) into the 'maps' folder.
- To get to this folder you will need to go into:

- Program Files>Steam>Steamapps>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps.

- The .bsp file included in the download should go in your maps folder.

- Load up the game and you should be able to play it.

_________________________________________________

If you have any problems or queries about this map then feel free to contact me:

- xfire: targetpractice808
- STEAM Friends: Target Practice

Enjoy the map and please assess it.


_________________________________________________
